Uses of Package
yaak.model.service

Packages that use yaak.model.service
yaak.model This package provides a world environment for domain modeling. 
yaak.model.service This package implements a service-oriented delegation strategy. 
 

Classes in yaak.model.service used by yaak.model
ServiceArena
          This ServiceArena interface represents an arena for coordinating agent services.
 

Classes in yaak.model.service used by yaak.model.service
Service
          Service is the base for all services.
ServiceArena
          This ServiceArena interface represents an arena for coordinating agent services.
ServiceListener
          ServiceListener allows agents to register with an arena to provide services.
ServiceNotification
          ServiceNotification communicates the required service request.
